languages.text: {n}Вы прикасаетесь к инфостику и понимаете, что не можете ни вытащить его, ни отнять пальцев от его поверхности: устройство словно примагнитило вас к себе!{/n}

traits.locale_text: Ну я вас все сказал, до свидания

languages.text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы прикасаетесь к инфостику и понимаете, что не можете ни вытащить его, ни отнять пальцев от его поверхности: устройство словно примагнитило вас к себе!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You touch the datastick and realize you can neither pull it out or pry fingers away from its surface: it's almost like the device has anchored you to itself!{/n}
{n}You touch the datastick and realize you can neither pull it out or pry fingers away from its surface: it's almost like the device has anchored you to itself!{/n}
{n}You touch the datastick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}
{n}You touch the datastick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}
{n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚一触碰到数据棒，就发现自己既无法拔出这根数据棒，也无法松开手指，仿佛你的手被一股强大的磁力吸住了一样！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚一触碰到数据棒，就发现自己既无法拔出这根数据棒，也无法松开手指，仿佛你的手被一股强大的磁力吸住了一样！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tocas el palo de datos y te das cuenta de que no puedes ni sacarlo ni separar tus dedos de la superficie. ¡Es como si una poderosa fuerza magnética inmovilizara tu mano!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tocas el palo de datos y te das cuenta de que no puedes ni sacarlo ni separar tus dedos de la superficie. ¡Es como si una poderosa fuerza magnética inmovilizara tu mano!{/n}

languages.text: {n}データスティックに触ってみると、引き抜いたり、外から指でこじ開けたりできないことがわかる。まるで強力な磁力のせいで、決まった位置から手を動かせないかのようだ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}データスティックに触ってみると、引き抜いたり、外から指でこじ開けたりできないことがわかる。まるで強力な磁力のせいで、決まった位置から手を動かせないかのようだ！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du berührst den Datenstick und erkennst, dass du ihn weder herausziehen noch deine Finger von seiner Oberfläche lösen kannst – als würde deine Hand von einer starken Magnetkraft festgehalten!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du berührst den Datenstick und erkennst, dass du ihn weder herausziehen noch deine Finger von seiner Oberfläche lösen kannst – als würde deine Hand von einer starken Magnetkraft festgehalten!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous touchez la clé de données et vous rendez bien vite compte que vous ne pouvez ni l'extraire ni retirer vos doigts de sa surface, comme si votre main était maintenue en place par une puissante force magnétique !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous touchez la clé de données et vous rendez bien vite compte que vous ne pouvez ni l'extraire ni retirer vos doigts de sa surface, comme si votre main était maintenue en place par une puissante force magnétique !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Veri belleğine dokunur dokunmaz çekip çıkaramadığını fark ediyor ancak parmaklarını da ayıramıyorsun. Elin, âdeta kudretli bir manyetik güç tarafından alıkonuluyor!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You touch the data-stick and realise you cannot pull it out or pry your fingers away from its surface, it is as if your hand is being held in place by a powerful magnetic force!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Veri belleğine dokunur dokunmaz çekip çıkaramadığını fark ediyorsun ancak parmaklarını da ayıramıyorsun. Elin âdeta kudretli bir manyetik güç tarafından alıkonuluyor!{/n}
